idea:
We at Dempora strive to be one of the pioneers in implementing new ideas/technologies/methods which many startups are hesitant to execute.

We believe that ever changing technology is nothing to be scared of, but something to be implemented as soon as possible to gain most out of it before anyone else does.

Our panel consists of individuals who are extremely passionate and experienced in their field and have an excellent foresight to what is going to be the trend of operations in the future.
name: Dempora

idea:
Indian population is massively underserved as far as dermatology is concerned

This leads to poor access to dermatologists, poor diagnosis with doctors, and very

often unqualified medical practitioners

This also encourages very dangerous issues like quackery & steroid abuse

This needs a systemic approach taking into account both demand (patient) &

supply (doctor) side

Supply side issues of improving the dermatologists efficiency & Primary Care

Physician’s accuracy can be achieved through Artificial Intelligence

Demand side issues of lack of access to doctors and delay in getting treated can

be addressed through enabling their interaction through technology like

telemedicine

eSkinDoctor is an AI enabled health-tech platform that bridges the inefficiencies in

dermatology treatment through cutting edge technology

4
name: eSkinDoctor

idea:
Respected Sir/Madam,

                 We , RISHIZ CORE PROJETS(OPC) PVT LTD, MUMBAI , are working in the field of development of climate resilient agriculture infrastructure through our expert team in POLY HOUSE,GREEN HOUSE erection and Seeds as we are licensed company of Government of Maharashtra and working for development for quality grains and vegetable for healthy society building.     

Our Areas of Expertise: Agribusiness, FPO, Seed Production, Skill Development and capacity building, Manufacturing, EPC, Builders & Land development, Urban Planning, Trading, Sales & services, EHS consulting, Infrastructure Consulting, Management Consulting, Government Liasoning & consulting ,KrishiRAj Seeds is Agro Business vertical of RishiZ Core Projects OPC Pvt ltd. company registered in Mumbai and primarily working on segments like Manufacturing, Food Processing, Suply Chain, Fire Safety, Real Estate and Trainings etc. We focus on Quality and productive seed production, Food Processing, Strengthen supply chain mechanism, and Explore new market avenues for best farm products also works in FPO. Kindly give us support from Government being a female driven Start up  working in agricultural infrastructure development and working to develop supply chain between farmers and national and  International Market for further planning and co-ordination.

Thanks!

 

Kind Regards,

Kavita Zine ,Director,

idea: Brego is a fin-tech application for small and medium businesses. Today, accounting and finance for SMEs is painful and challenging. Our vision is to streamline accounting operations and make Brego the financial operating system for SMEs. We aim to do this by providing real-time reporting, automated receivables and payables, integrated banking and automated data entry.
name: brego.ai

idea:
We have highly qualified and experienced construction experts & consultants. Each consultant offers a unique combination of technical expertise and capabilities to address our clients' challenges. We cultivate an atmosphere of creative thinking which maximizes our potential to provide innovative solutions, simplify complex issues, or give strategic guidance to meet our clients' objectives.


Our staff includes professional engineers, project and construction managers, construction experts, data analysts, certified cost engineers and consultants, communications specialists, and data scientists, among others.
